subject: RE: [junit] TestCase Dependency Hierarchy
msgSnippet: ... I don t understand the intent of the question. Without the TestSuite class, the collectors couldn t do their work, so it seems to me. Regards, Ilja
messageBody:
Adam Jack wrote:

> What test runners do most ordinary folks [and not just the
> junit experts who've been using it for years] use most, do
> those runner primarily use collectors, and do suites add value to
> those runners?

I don't understand the intent of the question. Without the TestSuite
class, the collectors couldn't do their work, so it seems to me.

Regards, Ilja
